Title: HigLabo
Description:
.Net client API of famous web service.
Library can be used on .net 4 and silverlight 4 and windows phone 7.
Support below
1.Twitter
2.Dropbox
3.SugarSync for .net4
(silverlight and WP7 coming soon...)
And we plan to support Windows Azure Rese api.

If you want to support other api, please send mail to 
higuchihiguchihiguchi@hotmail.com
HomeWiki:
We moved to GitHub
https://github.com/higty/higlabo


Project Description
This library include below library.
Change license to MIT.

Document and sample code
http://higlabo.codeplex.com/documentation

Inside of Mail protocol is here
http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/399207/Understanding-the-insides-of-the-SMTP-Mail-protoco
http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/404066/Understanding-the-insides-of-the-POP3-mail-protoco
http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/411018/Understanding-the-insides-of-the-IMAP-mail-protoco


.NET4
Net (Http OAuth Socket) 
Mail (Smtp POP3 IMAP)
Ftp
Twitter, Facebook, Rss, Ftp, Dropbox, SugarSync, Box.net
WindowsLive RestService
WindowsAzure Management RestService

Net (Http OAuth Socket)
Mail (Smtp POP3 IMAP)
Ftp
Twitter, Facebook, Rss, Dropbox, SugarSync, Box.net
WindowsLive RestService

Twitter, Facebook, Rss, Dropbox, SugarSync, Box.net

Mail (Smtp POP3 IMAP)
